name: FawnRun
description:
FawnRun
A casual mini-game with very simple controls.
You'll need to focus on dodging all moving objects and successfully picking up random fawn icons, up to 100!
The screen you see is the only level of the game, there are no upgrades, no more levels, no tight time requirements.

How it works:
A/D: Control movement
W: Control the jump
ESC: Pause the game

PS: Please be patient, calm, and move actively.If you can't pick up the fawn icon in the first place, don't worry about it, because the icon will reappear in a certain position in a short time.

End Conditions:
1. Hit any moving object!
2. Close the game!

Clearance Conditions:
1. Collect 100 fawn icons!

Have fun!
